title: Connection Problems
body: I'm constantly getting "Disconnected from PVP.Net" notices, and the last few games I've been playing, I've also been having latency issues. My last game I got the dc message while queuing for team builder. I must've gotten dc'd for real. I sat in queue for 10 minutes before I thought to try reloading the game. I got in and it said that I left a game in progress. Now I got a leaverbuster warning because of it.

replies.body:
Hey Raevana, 

Your client may be having problems connecting to League of Legends, but Riot has a magick KB that should fix you up. 

Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

Hope this fixes you up!
